solution_line_template: So he does {visits_per_day}*{days_per_week}=<<{visits_per_day}*{days_per_week}={visits_per_week}>>{visits_per_week} visits a week
That means he gives away {visits_per_week}*{toothbrushes_per_visit}=<<{visits_per_week}*{toothbrushes_per_visit}={toothbrushes_per_week}>>{toothbrushes_per_week} toothbrushes a week
